root.name: WRC 3
root.description: System RequirementsMinimumWindows XP (SP2) / Vista / 7CPU Intel 2.4Ghz or similar1 GB RAM512 MB Video Card with 512MB: Geforce 8800 GT / Radeon HD 3870 or higherRecommendedWindows XP (SP2) / Vista / 7CPU Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Athlon 64 X2 or higher2 GB RAM (XP) / 3 GB (Vista) / 4 GB (7)512 MB Video card with Pixel Shader 3.0: GeForce 9000 / Radeon HD4000 series or higher
